entry.name: Image
entry.label: Wallpaper image path or wallpaper name

entry.name: FillMode
entry.label: Sizing, cropping and positioning of the wallpaper image

entry.name: width
entry.label: Width of the wallpaper on screen

entry.name: height
entry.label: Height of the wallpaper on screen

entry.name: TickDelta
entry.label: Saturation changed each tick. From 0 (no change) to 1 (100% change).

entry.name: AnimationDuration
entry.label: How quickly the change takes effect. Use the same value as TickInterval for a constant animation at a cost of constant CPU usage.
